name: Shuttlecock-H
description:
Shuttlecock is for all people who love fast action and cute girls. You have to collect hearts while avoiding bullets, lasers and other spacecrafts. Unlock more levels and naked pictures with your skill, persistence, and passion for seeing women... happy.



Features:
- fast, one-handed Bullet Hell gameplay
- challenging level of difficulty
- charming women to get
- animated H-scenes
- japanese voice acting
- adrenaline pumping soundtrack
